message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $18000 is way out of my budget. I'm interested, but I can only go up to $10000 at this point. What do you think?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $14000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. $14000 is still a bit too high for me though. I'm really determined to get this product, but I can only go up to $12000. It's a fair compromise and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I'm willing to work with you. However, I'm not ready to give up on the $14000 price point just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $13500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you continuing to work with me. While $13500 is tempting, I'm still hoping to get closer to my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12500. It's a fair offer and I'm confident we can find common ground.

I understand you're really trying to stick to your budget, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not willing to go below $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $13250. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13250 is still a little too high for me. I'm feeling really confident that we can reach a deal. I'm offering $12750. It's a fair compromise and I believe we can both walk away happy.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $13000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. What do you think?
